remarks: The trivial action of a group on any set.  Each group element corresponds to the identity permutation.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 11-Aug-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)
statement:
gaid.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
gaid $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ S e. V ) -> ( 2nd |` ( X X. S ) ) e. ( G GrpAct S ) ) $.
